com.github.moribund.graphics.animations

Class AnimationContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.moribund.graphics.animations.AnimationContainer

  • public class AnimationContainer
extends java.lang.Object
    The AnimationContainer class contains SpriteAnimations.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private it.unimi.dsi.fastutil.objects.Object2ObjectMap<AnimationFile,SpriteAnimation> animationForFile
      A Object2ObjectOpenHashMap that contains all the SpriteAnimation in relation to their AnimationFile.
      private static AnimationContainer instance
      The singleton instance of this container.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private AnimationContainer()
      The constructor for the AnimationContainer.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SpriteAnimation getAnimation(AnimationFile file)
      Gets an SpriteAnimation from the animation hashmap.
      private SpriteAnimation makeAnimation(AnimationFile animationFile)
      Makes an animation using the AnimationFile's atlas file.
      void setup()
      Sets up the animationForFile looping through every AnimationFile value and using its AnimationFile.file field and calling AnimationContainer

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • animationForFile

        private it.unimi.dsi.fastutil.objects.Object2ObjectMap<AnimationFile,SpriteAnimation> animationForFile
        A Object2ObjectOpenHashMap that contains all the SpriteAnimation in relation to their AnimationFile. The reason to prefer a Object2ObjectOpenHashMap over a HashMap is due to fastutil's superior efficiency compared to vanilla Java's.

      • instance

        private static final AnimationContainer instance
        The singleton instance of this container.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AnimationContainer

        private AnimationContainer()
        The constructor for the AnimationContainer. This initializes animationForFile.

    • Method Detail

      • setup

        public void setup()
        Sets up the animationForFile looping through every AnimationFile value and using its AnimationFile.file field and calling AnimationContainer

      • makeAnimation

        private SpriteAnimation makeAnimation(AnimationFile animationFile)
        Makes an animation using the AnimationFile's atlas file.
        Parameters:
        animationFile - The respective animation file to make an animation from.
        Returns:
        The newly made SpriteAnimation.

      • getAnimation

        public SpriteAnimation getAnimation(AnimationFile file)
        Gets an SpriteAnimation from the animation hashmap.
        Parameters:
        file - The file to fetch the animation of.
        Returns:
        The respective file's animation.
